channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: Traps, Pesticides Threatened Ring-Necked Pheasant in Southern Taiwan
item.description: Ring-necked pheasants are under threat from pesticides and traps laid by farmers in southern Taiwan.

item.title: Taiwan Facing Fruit Shortages After Poor Weather Disrupts Harvests
item.description: Unseasonal weather and recent earthquakes are disrupting fruit harvests across Taiwan, with some farmers reporting a drop in yields of more than 50%.

item.title: China Announces Willingness To Boost Cross-Strait Exchanges With Taiwan
item.description: Just two weeks after Chinese President Xi Jin Ping and Taiwan's former President Ma Ying-jeou met face-to-face, China's Taiwan Affairs Office has announced plans to promote more cr

item.title: President-Elect Lai Reveals His New National Security Team
item.description: President-elect Lai Ching-te has unveiled his new national security team who will guide the country's foreign policy, defense strategy and relations with China once he takes office
